text: The Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities (DLUHC) is the UK Government department for housing, communities and local government in England.Hansard 22 January 2018 column 19 It was set up in May 2006. The department shares its headquarters with the Home Office. == References == Category:Government agencies of the United Kingdom Category:Housing in the United Kingdom
title: Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities
